text: 6|46|Baluna, ‘tomara ki bhebe dekhecha, allah‌ yadi tomadera srabanasakti o drstisakti kere nena ebam tomadera hrdaye mohara kare dena tabe allah‌ chara ara kono prakrta ilaha ye tomadera egulo phiriye debe?’ Dekhuna,amara kirupa ayatasamuha bisatabhabe barnana kari; erapara'o tara mukha phiriye neya.
